title: How to Beat Level 224 in Pet Rescue

steps.headline: Focus on clearing multiple large clusters of same-colored blocks.
steps.description: The larger the clusters cleared, the faster you’ll earn Column Blaster boosters. This also helps generate extra points. Try to generate at least seven Column Blaster boosters. This is the total amount of boosters needed to clear blocks and pass level 224.

steps.headline: Wipe out the far right column using three Column Blaster boosters.
steps.description: This clears diamonds and meshed blocks from the column, and stacks the pet cages on top of one another.

steps.headline: Clear blocks between pet cages on the bottom row using Column Blaster boosters.
steps.description: All pet cages will link together after clearing these three blocks, with the exception of the cage in the far left column.

steps.headline: Clear the far left column using your last Column Blaster booster.
steps.description: This frees and rescues the first pet from its cage.

steps.headline: Use your remaining moves to open the linked pet cages.
steps.description: All eight pets will now be rescued.

text: Focus on clearing multiple large clusters of same-colored blocks. The larger the clusters cleared, the faster you’ll earn Column Blaster boosters. This also helps generate extra points. Try to generate at least seven Column Blaster boosters. This is the total amount of boosters needed to clear blocks and pass level 224. Wipe out the far right column using three Column Blaster boosters. This clears diamonds and meshed blocks from the column, and stacks the pet cages on top of one another. Clear blocks between pet cages on the bottom row using Column Blaster boosters. All pet cages will link together after clearing these three blocks, with the exception of the cage in the far left column. Clear the far left column using your last Column Blaster booster. This frees and rescues the first pet from its cage. Use your remaining moves to open the linked pet cages. All eight pets will now be rescued.
